fields.description:
We use the {{OSSpinlock}} API in your kroll-core and some XML operations a lot. It has formally been deprecated as of iOS 10.0 and should be replaced by the {{os_unfair_lock}} ({{os_unfair_lock_lock}} and {{ os_unfair_lock_unlock}}) API. The old API is meant to be unsafe on newer OS's, leading to possible crashes.

Note: Also the {{os_unfair_lock}} is a suggested replacement by Apple, we may want to consider other locks that are more GCD focussed.

Docs:
- https://github.com/moby/hyperkit/issues/47
- https://developer.apple.com/documentation/os/1646466-os_unfair_lock_lock
- https://blog.postmates.com/why-spinlocks-are-bad-on-ios-b69fc5221058
fields.summary: iOS: Replace OSSpinLock API with os_unfair_lock
